title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are displayed.
EB: Search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR: The issue occurs when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog. However, searching via the context menu in packages view works correctly.
